  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Jim Gilbert 
  To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, July 08, 2003 9:20 AM
  Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Tsuba book


  The first part of the series is in the August 2002 issue, which includes some notes from Jack Edick and Joly's introduction.  The beginning Japanese text was translated in the second installment.  I don't know if they are going to publish a bound version when it is complete.  When I joined the club I was able to purchase several years of back issues of the NL for a reasonable fee, so you may want to ask about that.  I think it's worth buying all of the old issues you can get, since there's always some interesting fittings information there.

  Jim
